levels.description: Attack range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Attack Interval is <@ba.vup>slightly shortened</>, and reduces Physical and Arts hit rate of ground enemies in attack range by <@ba.vup>{attack@damage_hitrate_physical:0%}</>. More likely to be attacked by enemies, and recovers <@ba.vup>{attack@hp_ratio:0%}</> max HP when enemy attacks miss or upon a successful dodge.
